content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff("{Machine}" == "*" or isempty("{Machine}"), "", "{Machine}");
let EventDescriptions = datatable(EventID_d:int, EventDescription:string)
[
    0,     "System startup or undefined event",
    8,     "Hardware error (potential BSOD or NMI interrupt)",
    9,     "Hardware failure (possible memory or CPU issue)",
    10,    "Hardware error logged by system firmware",
    11,    "I/O or controller failure detected",
    12,    "Session disconnect or termination - Source: rpm",
    23, "AppModel-State: App was suspended",
    24, "AppModel-State: App was resumed",
    256,   "Chrome extension or plugin failure",
    503,   "Citrix ConfigSync: sync started",
    505,   "Citrix ConfigSync: sync completed",
    528,   "Logon successful (legacy pre-Vista)",
    1000,  "Application crash",
    1001,  "App crash report (WER)",
    1002,  "Application hang",
    1003,  "License status check - Microsoft-Windows-Security-SPP",
    1019,  "TDICA SSL handshake failure - Source: TdIca",
    1027,  "User session started - Citrix Desktop Service",
    1030, "Citrix Desktop Service: User logoff detected",
    1049,  "DHCP client could not obtain a lease",
    1102,  "Security audit log cleared",
    1552,  "User profile event (load or sync profile data)",
    1502, "User profile was unloaded successfully",
    1508, "Failed to read user registry hive (NTUSER.DAT) during logon",
    1509, "Access error while reading user profile file (permissions, lock, etc.)",
    1511, "Default profile used — user profile not found or corrupt",
    1515, "User profile partially loaded — unable to fully recover profile",
    16384, "SPP: Licensing status or activation update",
    16394, "SPP: Software Protection Platform license failure or retry",
    2000,  "Profile processing started - Citrix Profile Management",
    2001,  "Profile processing completed - Citrix Profile Management",
    4624,  "Successful logon",
    4625,  "Failed logon attempt",
    4627,  "Group membership information updated",
    4660,  "An object was deleted (Audit Object Access)",
    4662,  "An operation was performed on an object",
    4663,  "Attempt to access an object",
    4672,  "Special privileges assigned to new logon",
    4673,  "Privileged service was called",
    4688,  "New process created",
    4697,  "Service installed via SCM",
    4702,  "Scheduled task updated (Audit Policy Change)",
    4798,  "A user's local group membership was enumerated",
    4799,  "Security-enabled local group membership enumerated",
    5001,  "Profile sync issue - Citrix Profile Management",
    5005,  "User profile loaded - Citrix Profile Management",
    5006,  "User profile unloaded - Citrix Profile Management",
    5007, "UPM failed to load the profile — session ID mismatch or corruption",
    5008, "UPM profile load failed — usually due to file lock or registry issue",
    5009,  "Temporary profile loaded due to profile error - Citrix Profile Management",
    5010,  "Profile error encountered - Citrix Profile Management",
    5379,  "Credential Manager credentials were read - potential credential access audit",
    6000, "Winlogon: The shell has been loaded (e.g., Explorer.exe)",
    6005,  "Event log service started (system boot)",
    6006,  "Event log service stopped (system shutdown)",
    7045,  "New service installed",
    9027,  "Desktop Window Manager rendering event",
    9019,  "WEM user logon processing started - Citrix WEM",
    10000, "Citrix Agent WatchDog service event",
    10010, "DistributedCOM timeout — application failed to register/launch within the time required",
    10100, "Citrix ADAgent service status event",
    36928, "Schannel: TLS/SSL fatal error (possible cert trust or handshake failure)"
];
uberAgentESA_System_WinEvtLogForwarding_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| extend EventID_int = toint(EventID_d)
| summarize EventCount = count() by EventID_int
| top 10 by EventCount
| join kind=leftouter (EventDescriptions) on $left.EventID_int == $right.EventID_d
| project ['Event ID'] = EventID_int, ['Occurrences'] = EventCount, ['Description'] = coalesce(EventDescription, "Unknown Event ID")
content.title: Top Event IDs by Volume

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff("{Machine}" == "*" or isempty("{Machine}"), "", "{Machine}");
uberAgentESA_System_WinEvtLogForwarding_CL
| summarize EventCount = count() by Computer
| top 10 by EventCount
| project ['Computer'] = Computer, ['Event Count'] = EventCount
| render barchart
content.title: Top Computers by Event Count

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff("{Machine}" == "*" or isempty("{Machine}"), "", "{Machine}");
uberAgentESA_System_WinEvtLogForwarding_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| summarize EventCount = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| project ['Time'] = TimeGenerated, ['Events'] = EventCount
| order by ['Time'] asc
| render timechart
content.title: Event Volume Over Time

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff("{Machine}" == "*" or isempty("{Machine}"), "", "{Machine}");
uberAgentESA_System_WinEvtLogForwarding_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| summarize EventCount = count() by ProviderName_s
| top 10 by EventCount
| project ['Provider'] = ProviderName_s, ['Event Count'] = EventCount
| render piechart
content.title: Top Event Sources (Providers)

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff("{Machine}" == "*" or isempty("{Machine}"), "", "{Machine}");
uberAgentESA_System_WinEvtLogForwarding_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| summarize EventCount = count() by Channel_s
| top 10 by EventCount
| project ['Channel'] = Channel_s, ['Event Count'] = EventCount
| render barchart
content.title: Event Log Breakdown by Channel

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff("{Machine}" == "*" or isempty("{Machine}"), "", "{Machine}");
uberAgentESA_System_WinEvtLogForwarding_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| where EventID_d in (4625, 4673, 1102, 4697, 4660, 5145)
| summarize Count = count() by EventID_d, Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
content.title: Suspicious Event Tracker

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff("{Machine}" == "*" or isempty("{Machine}"), "", "{Machine}");
let EventIDFilter = iff("{EventID}" == "*" or isempty("{EventID}"), -1, toint("{EventID}"));

let EventDescriptions = datatable(EventID_d:int, EventDescription:string)
[
    0,     "System startup or undefined event",
    8,     "Hardware error (potential BSOD or NMI interrupt)",
    9,     "Hardware failure (possible memory or CPU issue)",
    10,    "Hardware error logged by system firmware",
    11,    "I/O or controller failure detected",
    12,    "Session disconnect or termination - Source: rpm",
    23, "AppModel-State: App was suspended",
    24, "AppModel-State: App was resumed",
    256,   "Chrome extension or plugin failure",
    503,   "Citrix ConfigSync: sync started",
    505,   "Citrix ConfigSync: sync completed",
    528,   "Logon successful (legacy pre-Vista)",
    1000,  "Application crash",
    1001,  "App crash report (WER)",
    1002,  "Application hang",
    1003,  "License status check - Microsoft-Windows-Security-SPP",
    1019,  "TDICA SSL handshake failure - Source: TdIca",
    1027,  "User session started - Citrix Desktop Service",
    1030, "Citrix Desktop Service: User logoff detected",
    1049,  "DHCP client could not obtain a lease",
    1102,  "Security audit log cleared",
    1552,  "User profile event (load or sync profile data)",
    1502, "User profile was unloaded successfully",
    1508, "Failed to read user registry hive (NTUSER.DAT) during logon",
    1509, "Access error while reading user profile file (permissions, lock, etc.)",
    1511, "Default profile used — user profile not found or corrupt",
    1515, "User profile partially loaded — unable to fully recover profile",
    16384, "SPP: Licensing status or activation update",
    16394, "SPP: Software Protection Platform license failure or retry",
    2000,  "Profile processing started - Citrix Profile Management",
    2001,  "Profile processing completed - Citrix Profile Management",
    4624,  "Successful logon",
    4625,  "Failed logon attempt",
    4627,  "Group membership information updated",
    4660,  "An object was deleted (Audit Object Access)",
    4662,  "An operation was performed on an object",
    4663,  "Attempt to access an object",
    4672,  "Special privileges assigned to new logon",
    4673,  "Privileged service was called",
    4688,  "New process created",
    4697,  "Service installed via SCM",
    4702,  "Scheduled task updated (Audit Policy Change)",
    4798,  "A user's local group membership was enumerated",
    4799,  "Security-enabled local group membership enumerated",
    5001,  "Profile sync issue - Citrix Profile Management",
    5005,  "User profile loaded - Citrix Profile Management",
    5006,  "User profile unloaded - Citrix Profile Management",
    5007, "UPM failed to load the profile — session ID mismatch or corruption",
    5008, "UPM profile load failed — usually due to file lock or registry issue",
    5009,  "Temporary profile loaded due to profile error - Citrix Profile Management",
    5010,  "Profile error encountered - Citrix Profile Management",
    5379,  "Credential Manager credentials were read - potential credential access audit",
    6000, "Winlogon: The shell has been loaded (e.g., Explorer.exe)",
    6005,  "Event log service started (system boot)",
    6006,  "Event log service stopped (system shutdown)",
    7045,  "New service installed",
    9027,  "Desktop Window Manager rendering event",
    9019,  "WEM user logon processing started - Citrix WEM",
    10000, "Citrix Agent WatchDog service event",
    10010, "DistributedCOM timeout — application failed to register/launch within the time required",
    10100, "Citrix ADAgent service status event",
    36928, "Schannel: TLS/SSL fatal error (possible cert trust or handshake failure)"
];

uberAgentESA_System_WinEvtLogForwarding_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| extend EventID_int = toint(EventID_d)
| where EventIDFilter == -1 or EventID_int == EventIDFilter
| join kind=leftouter (EventDescriptions) on $left.EventID_int == $right.EventID_d
| extend ParsedData = parse_json(EventData_s)
| extend
    Data0 = tostring(ParsedData.Data0),
    Data1 = tostring(ParsedData.Data1),
    Data2 = tostring(ParsedData.Data2),
    Data3 = tostring(ParsedData.Data3),
    Data4 = tostring(ParsedData.Data4)
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    Computer,
    EventID = EventID_int,
    Description = coalesce(EventDescription, "Unknown Event ID"),
    Provider = ProviderName_s,
    Channel = Channel_s,
    Level = Level_d,
    ProcessID = ProcessID_d,
    Data0,
    Data1,
    Data2,
    Data3,
    Data4
| sort by TimeGenerated desc

uberAgentESA_System_WinEvtLogForwarding_CL
| where Level_d in (1, 2) // 1 = Critical, 2 = Error
| where Computer has "{Machine}" or "{Machine}" == "*"
| summarize Count = count() by Channel_s, EventID_d, ProviderName_s
content.title: Critical & Error Level Events

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff("{Machine}" == "*" or isempty("{Machine}"), "", "{Machine}");
uberAgentESA_System_WinEvtLogForwarding_CL
| where Channel_s == "Security"
| extend EventData = parse_json(EventData_s)
| extend User = tostring(EventData.SubjectUserName)
| where isnotempty(User)
| summarize EventCount = count() by User
| top 10 by EventCount desc
content.title: Audit Event by User

content.query:
uberAgentESA_System_WinEvtLogForwarding_CL
| where Computer has "{Machine}" or "{Machine}" == "*"
| summarize Count = count() by Channel_s
content.title: System Event Breakdown by Channel
